class.name: shakey_planning_actions/state_creator_robot_pose
class.description: Sets the current robot pose in the state and possible at-style predicates.

class.name: shakey_planning_actions/goal_creator_objects
class.description: Sets goal condition to push all objects.

class.description: Action executor for pushing an object.

class.name: shakey_planning_actions/action_executor_drive_base
class.description: An action executor that moves the base.
